"Welcome back. I can tell you have made: "In fact, I'd say you're ready to go on to the next boot camp session."
"But first, let me tell you about another skill you should be using."
"Please attack steadily while remembering this momentum."
"Set Trap is a Ranger skill. It sets a timed trap on the battlefield to catch enemies in the blast."
"Once you set a trap, a timer appears above. The countdown begins from the moment a trap is set."
"Once the timer ends, the trap detonates. The range and effect of the explosion depend on the type of trap you set."

"To use a trap, you must learn the corresponding Ranger trap skill. The traps themselves can be bought from shops.

Use traps to turn the tables when you're in a jam."
